name: test-yarn2
description: Tests for dictionaries included by a Yarn 2 repository

scripts.prepare-cspell-action: pnpm run prepare-yarn2 && pnpm run prepare-yarn3
scripts.prepare-yarn2: pnpm run prepare-yarn2-med && pnpm run prepare-yarn2-sci
scripts.prepare-yarn3: pnpm run prepare-yarn3-med && pnpm run prepare-yarn3-sci
scripts.test: pnpm run test-yarn2 && pnpm run test-yarn3
scripts.test-yarn2: pnpm run test-yarn2-med && pnpm run test-yarn2-sci
scripts.test-yarn3: pnpm run test-yarn3-med && pnpm run test-yarn3-sci
